features: FOAMING FACE WASH: Andalou gentle face cleanser creates an airy foam that gently removes makeup and pollutants without stripping essential moisture from the skin. It soothes, hydrates, and helps nourish, restore and protect a more healthy skin microbiome

SENSITIVE SKIN FACE WASH: This daily hydrating face wash is formulated with vitamin E, Aloe leaf juice and our unique Rose-Biotic Blend consisting of Rosa Centifolia Extract, Postbiotics & Alpine Rose Stem Cells to help nurture, fortify & revitalize skin

SOOTHING AND GENTLE: This facial wash is dermatologically tested and gentle on skin. The hyaluronate and aloe add hydrating benefits to dry, irritated skin. Infused with 100% natural rose fragrance and white tea leaf extract for antioxidant benefits

CLEAN SKINCARE STANDARDS: Andalou Naturals products are always cruelty-free, formulated gluten-free, and free from potentially harmful ingredients such as parabens, phthalates, sulfates SLS & SLES, petrochemicals, GMOs, synthetic colors and dyes, and artificial fragrances

FRUIT STEM CELL SCIENCE: Every Andalou Naturals product—including masks, creams, serums, moisturizers, cleansers, and toners—use nature's antioxidant defense solution to protect and support healthy skin and hair
body.description: Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Gentle Cleansing Foam Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Gentle Cleansing Foam removes makeup and pollutants without stripping ​moisture from the skin. It leaves skin feeling nourished and hydrated after every wash. Formulated with our unique Rose-Biotic Blend, this gentle face wash consists of Rosa Centifolia Extract to help smooth the skin's texture, postbiotics to strengthen the skin's barrier, and Alpine Rose Stem Cells to help protect and restore vitality. Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant promotes moisture, and certified organic Aloe leaf juice helps nourish skin cells and soothe dry, irritated skin. Fair-Trade White Tea Leaf extract helps protect skin from oxidative stress and free radicals, promoting a younger-looking complexion. Fruit Stem Cell Science is our signature innovation for skin care products to protect and support healthy skin. Our products feature only ingredients that are organic, gluten-free, sustainable, cruelty-free and nature-derived. Non-GMO remains a core brand value of Andalou Naturals and we continue to source superior non-GMO ingredients for our products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1000 Roses Gentle Cleansing Foam 1000 Roses Biome Balancing Toner 1000 Roses Fresh + Dewy 2-in-1 Serum 1000 Roses Soothing Squalane Oil 1000 Roses Biome Balancing Day Cream 1000 Roses Fortifying Night Cream Benefits Gently washes away makeup and pollutants without stripping essential moisture Refreshing mist toner that soothes and calms your senses with roses Helps hydrate and nourish with postbiotic rose water, vitamins, and hyaluronic acid Locks in moisture to protect the skin barrier and deliver a dewy glow Lightweight everday cream that helps balance the skin microbiome Rich, luxurious cream that helps soften, smooth, and soothe skin overnight When to Use AM & PM AM & PM or throughout the day AM & PM AM & PM AM PM How to Use Apply to damp skin, gently massage in a circular motion, and rinse clean. Close your eyes and gently spray onto face. Shake to activate. Apply on clean face and neck Gently press a few drops onto cleansed face & neck or mix in with moisturizer Massage in to face and neck Massage in to face and neck

Key Ingredients Alpine Rose Stem Cells Alpine Rose Stem Cells are sustainably derived from a rose variety that grows in extreme conditions in the Swiss alps to help improve skin vitality and protect the skin barrier from oxidative stress Aloe Vera Organic Aloe Vera Leaf Juice helps revive the skin's moisture barrier and soothe dry, irritated skin Vitamin E Vitamin E derived from sunflower to protect against environmental aggressors and promote moisture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Rose Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: This rose scented natural face wash is amazing. It totally washes off all my makeup, eye makeup included, does not strip my skin, and leaves my face feeling dewy. One little pump of foam is enough for one wash, a little goes a long way. And Andalou's price point is excellent. Great find and great buy. Thanks, Andalou!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The splendor of June's blossoms, a thousand gifts of beauty carefully preserved into a fairy light foam that soothes and cleanses the most delicate face.This rose aroma is spectacularly genuine. I grow roses in my garden and am surrounded by the brief emergence of wild roses each spring here in the northwest mountains. My nose would know if the roses I grow and those in the bottle were not true but faux.The bottle lasts a long time. I had used about half of it when my daughter was struggling with her very sensitive skin and I surrendered my precious rose cleanser for her to try. She loved the scent, non-sticky texture (she's hated that since she was a wee one) and ease of use. It did not irritate her skin like many other products have.My 48 year old face enjoys the softness and simplicity of this cleanser. It removes my make-up which I keep natural looking so I can't comment if your make-up is applied like spackle with surfer's dream catching the wave eyebrows, but if you enhance your face with a touch of grace and balance this cleanser will have no challenge cleansing it.I truly appreciate products like Andalou. The benefits of a non-gmo, cruelty-free, GF, vegan and it's 99% naturally derived. There may be other rose scented products on the market but in their barely pronounceable ingredients list you'll see "fragrance" which can mean thousands of chemicals. Stick with the kind that grow naturally and your face will thank you.I've started trying out other products in their line - like the Pumpkin Honey Glycolic brightening mask - oh my goodness it's like autumn pumpkin spice latte spa aromatherapy!Excellent product, I will be buying it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This brand has a whole line of facial goodness, but this one in particular is very good for sensitive skin. My aesthetician recommended this a couple years ago and I love it specifically because it’s gentle, has a very light/rose scent and wonderful ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This face wash is light and fresh and perfectly cleans your skin without drying it. I have sensitive skin and this works perfectly. I have used face washes ranging in all prices and I always come back to this one because it is so gentle on the skin but also cleans away any makeup or daily build up. Love that it is a light foam too, so easy to use and never have any breaks out groom using this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST for my sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product since May, 2016, and just now decided to write a review.My skin is very sensitive, and I had used cleansers at different price points (Cle de Peau, Clarisonic, Clinique, Neutrogena, Garnier, Cetaphil, Lancome, La Roche-Posay, etc.) in the past. I was always on the look-out for new cleansers because at that point no cleanser seemed to be in agreement with my face, so this is how I found this product. I thought it was cheap, but it was natural, so I had nothing to lose and decided to give it a go.I bought my first bottle sometime in May of 2016, and started using it as instructed - morning and evening, and let me tell you - I haven't looked at other cleansers since. I can't say enough good things about this cleanser. It leaves my skin clean and feeling fresh all day long. I have oily T-zone, and I hate the feeling of grease/oil on my face. Other cleansers would feel good for about 3-4 hours post-use and then I'd be back at feeling oily and gross. After using this cleanser my face doesn't feel oily, nor overdried.With regards to makeup, I discovered that it is also a fantastic make-up remover. I have full face of make-up (read: primer, foundation, concealer, setting powder, bronzer, and blush) on a daily basis, and in the evening I use the cleansing foam to remove all of it and it's working like magic! It dissolves and take out all of the makeup and dirt that's collected over the course of the day. When drying my face, I would often find make-up residue after washing my face with other cleansers, which would eventually cause me to break out, but not with this cleansing foam. I do three pumps in the evening, which is enough to cleanse my face; no make-up residue on my drying towel, nor breakouts on my face.The best thing is that after over 2 years of consistent use, the product is still working great with my face. I strongly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I'm on my 3rd bottle of this cleanser, after trying hundreds of cleansers over the past 4 decades. This one lathers nicely, cleans effectively without drying my skin, and rinses off easily. It smells amazing to me -- reminiscent of rose and peony with a faint hint of strawberry. I can't speak to its ability to reduce wrinkles, prevent breakouts, or firm skin. For me, it's just a basic cleanser that does it's job without irritating my skin, even during my winter dry spells. At this price, I see no reason to buy any other cleanser after using this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Suitable for sensitive skin. There was no reaction. Cleans quite well. Doesn't dry out the skin. I am pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Makes skin squeaky clean. Refreshing smell, not at all messy to use. Just one pump does the trick

reviews.reviewerName: What it is what it doWhat it is what it do
reviews.reviewTitle: Gentle, cleansing, and works very well!
reviews.reviewText: I've only recently discovered this is sold on Amazon instead of me going to my health food store. Price is I think around 1-2$ cheaper here. For those who may be wary about online cosmetic package safety - I ordered two bottles and both came in their boxes, and individually plastic wrapped in addition to that.ABOUT PRODUCTThis is a foam product with a lovely rose scent, and if you use this every day and night, should last around a month, give or take how much you use (sometimes I like to use on my neck and chest).I have sensitive-reactive skin. If there are too many ingredients in a product, I itch and get red patches on my face for a few hours. This product helps to subside random breakouts, reduce redness, and calm the skin, leaving a very soft and supple feeling after use.I recommend using this before bed and in the morning. But, when using this before bed, I'd recommend using one of those silicon face scrubbers to apply the product. It really helps remove grime on a deeper level before bed, when your skin does the most regeneration.
Excellent produit , très doux et bien l'avant

Ho la pelle molto sensibile, tendente all'acne e ad essere secca allo stesso tempo. Questo detergente si presenta liquido in bottiglietta ma, a causa di qualche strana tecnologia, una volta prelevato diventa una mousse schiumosa: lava bene il viso (sia truccato che non) senza irritare pelle e occhi. Tuttavia tende a seccare, non rimane la pelle molto morbida ma abbastanza ruvida e non ha grande potere d'efficacia contro le imperfezioni. Utilizzato una volta al giorno, nella giusta quantità, può durare fino a tre mesi. È realmente vegano e cruelty-free. Lo consiglio a chi la ha pelle normale, sensibile ma non molto secca: per ora proverò altro.

Eins vorweg! Ich habe sehr trockene Haut mit Unreinheiten! Eine schlimme Kombi!Ich bin schon jahrelang auf der Suche nach DEM Cleanser! Ich habe es mit Reinigungsmilch, mit Öl, Reinigungsgele und Lotions versucht, aber entweder sah meine Haut danach speckig oder trocken aus! Natürlich macht meine Neurodermitis auf dem Gesicht und auf meinen Händen ihr übriges! Also probierte ich und wurde immer wieder enttäuscht. Durch Zufall bin ich dann auf diesem Cleanser gestoßen! Leider gibt es diese Firma nicht in Deutschland, sodass ich sie hier bestellt habe. Ich habe ca. 15€ bezahlt! Manche mögen es viel finden, aber wenn ich überlege wieviel Geld ich schon aus dem Fenster geworfen habe, dann sind die 15€ nur ein Tropfen auf dem heißen Stein.Zunächst die Flasche: Die Flüssigkeit befindet sich in einer soliden Plastikflasche! Viele sagen jetzt es soll aus Glas sein, aber wenn die Flasche runterfällt (und das passiert schnell mit nassen Händen), dann wünschen sie sich kein Glas mehr!Die Flüssigkeit an sich ist farblos! Der Schaum ist toll und kompakt und verschwindet auch nicht so schnell. Der Duft ist toll! Wer keine Rosen mag, soll lieber einen großen Bogen um den Cleanser machen. Er riecht nach türkischen Rosen!Ergiebigkeit: Sehr gut. Man soll nicht mit den Schaum übertreiben sonst trocknet die Haut arg aus! Lieber einen halben bis einen Pump reicht aus! In Verbindung mit einem Konjac Sponge unschlagbar!Ich persönlich lasse den Cleanser am liebsten vollständig einziehen, damit der leichte Peelingeffekt funktioniert (Fruchtsäure)!Ich persönlich werde es nur im Sommer verwenden, da er dann doch zu wenig Feuchtigkeit spendet, aber im Sommer einfach genial! Für Mischhaut ist sogar eventuell eine ganzjährige Anwendung denkbar.Leider gibt es nur wenig Produkte, die man in Deutschland erhalten kann, deswegen ist es schwer, welche der Serien von der Firma zu einem passt, aber die Sensitive Reihe ist toll, sodass ich annehme, dass die anderen Serien unschlagbar sind. Hoffe, dass die blaue Serie (für sehr trockene Haut) auch bald hier erhältlich ist und zwar nicht zum Wucherpreis.Also Leute, gibt der Marke eine Chance! Ich habe es getan und bereue es nicht. Im Gegenteil werde ich mich bemühen noch mehr Produkte auszuprobieren, besonders deren Sonnenschutzprodukte!
